metadata.title: Lal Maas - Rajasthani Village Food Red Meat Mutton Recipe लाल मांस मटन कैसे बनायें : Primitive Style
metadata.description: She was making this Real Rajasthani Food Of India - Traditional dish (लाल मांस ) Lal Maans on home made mud stove with fuel made of cow dung and wood and dry stick as primitive technology in this shubh journey . She used clay pot to cook the curry. curd was also set in clay pot. Red meat is a typical rajasthani food . the recipe of rajasthani Red meat is simple . indian spices are used in this.the indian village woman also told how to make this dish.
